category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_admin_for_inactive_user
preference.preference_description: Defines the mailing list to be notified when the workflow automatically reassigns a task or signoff to a resource pool if the user is inactive. It is a single value string type preference. Valid Values: * Any valid email address. For multiple email addresses use semicolon (;) to separate two email addresses.
